mng: surname Yun, abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

exm.mng: Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[dian1] or 雲|云, capital Kunming 昆明
to gather (in a crowd), to converge, to swarm
Miyun town and county in Beijing
a haze of doubts and suspicions
Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇 or 雲|云, capital Kunming 昆明
to vanish like smoke in thin air, to disappear
and so on, so and so, many and confused
